settings.title: Settings
update.title: App Updater
update.noUpdate: You are using the latest version.
update.newVersionAvailable: A new version is available: v{version}
common.title: Title
alert.tryRestartingServer: Try restarting the server and try again.
alert.variableUsername: The Twitch username of the user who triggered the alert.
alert.variableUserDisplayName: The Twitch display name of the user who triggered the alert.
alert.variableRewardTitle: The title of the custom reward redeemed.
alert.variableRewardCost: The cost of the custom reward redeemed.
alert.variableUserInput: The user input provided by the user when redeeming the reward.
redeems.inStockInfo: Indicates whether the reward is in stock.
redeems.enabledInfo: This indicates whether the reward is enabled. Viewers see only enabled rewards.
redeems.pausedInfo: This determines whether to pause the reward. Viewers can't redeem paused rewards.
redeems.isUserInputRequiredInfo: This determines whether users must enter information to redeem the reward. Change the prompt field to customize the user input requirements.
redeems.shouldRedemptionsBeSkippedInfo: This determines whether redemptions should be set to FULFILLED status immediately when a reward is redeemed. If unchecked, status is set to UNFULFILLED and follows the normal request queue process.
redeems.maxPerStreamInfo: The maximum number of redemptions allowed per live stream. The minimum value is 1.
redeems.maxPerUserPerStreamInfo: The maximum number of redemptions allowed per user per stream. The minimum value is 1.
redeems.globalCooldownInfo: The global cooldown period for all redemptions. The minimum value is 1.
redeems.notEditableWarning: Twitch won't let you edit rewards that were not created using this app. You can still add sound to this Twitch reward, but other settings must be changed on Twitch.
redeems.editableWarning: You can edit this reward because it was created using this app
redeems.deleteRewardConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this custom reward {rewardTitle}? This action cannot be undone.
redeems.titleRequired: Title is required to create a new reward
redeems.costRequired: Cost must be a positive number to create a new reward
redeems.saveFailed: Failed to save reward to Twitch
redeems.settingsSaveFailed: Failed to save alert settings locally
redeems.deleteFailed: Failed to delete reward from Twitch
redeems.startingNewReward: You can edit the new reward now, then save it using the Save button on the bottom of the panel.
redeems.fetchCustomRewardsFailed: Error fetching custom rewards from Twitch
twitchChat.loadCacheFailed: Failed to load cached messages and redeems
twitchChat.checkConnectionFailed: Failed to check Twitch chat connection status
